author: NewsBreak Original
title: Kennedy family announces endorsement of Biden for president at North Philly rec center
text:
By Pat Loeb ,
1 hour ago
NORTH PHILADELPHIA (KYW Newsradio) ‚Äî Members of the Kennedy family joined President Joe Biden at the Martin Luther King Jr. Recreation Center in North Philadelphia on Thursday to announce their endorsement of him for a second term in the White House.
The president was also in North Philly to visit a campaign phone bank at the rec center, and said Pennsylvania was his ticket to the White House.
Kerry Kennedy spoke for the family in the gym of the rec center to the cheers of about 200 invited guests. She talked about Biden‚Äôs record, but also the values she said he shared with her father, Robert Kennedy and uncle, 35th U.S. President John F. Kennedy.
‚ÄúThat‚Äôs why nearly every single grandchild of Joe and Rose Kennedy supports Joe Biden,‚Äù said Kennedy.
In total, 15 members of the Kennedy family joined Biden in North Philly on Thursday for the endorsement announcement. The president beamed alongside the members that joined him on stage and called the endorsement an ‚Äúincredible honor.‚Äù
He also spoke of how Robert Kennedy inspired his own path into public service.
‚ÄúI‚Äôve done so in large part because I thought it was something your dad would have done,‚Äù he told Kerry. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs always been on my mind, been one of my heroes.‚Äù
The notable exception from the ceremony was Robert F. Kennedy Jr., who is running for president as an independent. His run could take votes from Biden and provide a path to the White House for his Republican challenger.
Neither Biden nor Kerry Kennedy addressed RFK Jr. in their remarks.
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: Newsweek
title: Polar Vortex Maps Show How Far Temperatures Could Plunge in Each State
text:
Bitter temperatures are forecast to hit swathes of the U.S. this weekend, with the National Weather Service predicting that the cold snap could last well into January.
Why It Matters
Subfreezing temperatures are expected to affect the majority of Americans throughout Saturday and into the following week, particularly in the Midwest, Heartlands and Northeastern regions.
Strong winds, sleet, ice and heavy snow are also expected in some areas, including some Southern states, later in the weekend, which could lead to perilous conditions.
What To Know
The polar vortex‚Äîthe area of cold air that circulates around the Arctic‚Äîis forecast to expand this weekend, bringing dangerously cold weather with it. Temperature forecast maps from multiple sources show freezing conditions throughout the weekend.
According to NWS predictions, the coldest temperatures will be experienced across North Dakota, Minnesota and Montana, where there could be cold snaps of up to -4 degrees Fahrenheit in some areas on Friday, particularly along the U.S.-Canada border, with wind chills as cold as -29 degrees. Maps by Pivotal Weather show that temperatures could drop as low as -21 degrees in North Dakota on Saturday.
The same map shows below-freezing temperatures are expected all the way from Washington (30 degrees), down through Nevada (20 degrees), across the plains to Virginia (17 degrees), up through New York (21degrees) to Maine (15 degrees) on Saturday morning. There is little prospect of temperatures improving much throughout the day.
Similar temperatures are expected for Sunday, with a low of -12 degrees expected along the North Dakota-Minnesota border as of 7 a.m. ET. Cold weather is also expected to travel further southward into New Mexico, Texas and Louisiana, with between 17 degrees and 37 degrees forecast for Sunday morning.
What People Are Saying
AccuWeather chief on-air meteorologist Bernie Rayno said in an email to Newsweek: ‚ÄúThis is the first snow and ice storm of 2025, and we could see widespread impacts. This storm will be far enough south to cause major problems in cities that may struggle to deal with wintry weather and ice. Arctic air will surge southward in the wake of this storm with subfreezing temperatures for millions of people.‚Äù
Weather Prediction Center meteorologist Scott Kleebauer told The New York Times: ‚ÄúThis has the potential to be a fairly significant Arctic outbreak. The one thing for sure is that it‚Äôs going to get cold, and it‚Äôs going to last a fairly long period of time.‚Äù
The National Weather Service said in its January 3 short-range discussion: ‚ÄúAreas in the Central Plains and Central Mississippi Valley, especially along and north of Interstate 70, are likely to experience heavy snowfall, with a high chance (60-90 percent) of at least 6 inches of snow from late Saturday into Sunday. Significant sleet and freezing rain are anticipated from eastern Kansas and the Ozarks extending eastward to the Tennessee and lower Ohio Valleys, also on Saturday into Sunday.‚Äù
What Happens Next
Temperature maps from multiple sources show freezing temperatures throughout the weekend and into next week. Looking further ahead, the NWS has forecast that temperatures will rise in the west from January 10 onward. An average climate is expected in the Great Plains, but lower than normal readings are anticipated for much of the Midwest, East and South up to January 16.
The post Polar Vortex Maps Show How Far Temperatures Could Plunge in Each State appeared first on Newsweek.

author: robbytecnolog√≠a@pulzo-hermes.com
title: C√≥mo aprender ingl√©s f√°cil y divertido: herramientas gratuitas de Google
text: En un mundo cada vez m√°s globalizado, el ingl√©s se ha convertido en el idioma de la comunicaci√≥n internacional. Por esta raz√≥n, es cada vez m√°s importante que las personas de todo el mundo lo aprendan. El dominio del ingl√©s puede abrir nuevas oportunidades laborales, acad√©micas y personales. Por otro lado, muchos creen que Google es √∫nicamente un traductor cuando de aprendizaje de ingl√©s se trata. Pero la realidad es que la gran compa√±√≠a cuenta con una variedad de herramientas interesantes y aptas para ayudar a las personas en su [proceso de estudiar un nuevo idioma](https://www.pulzo.com/vivir-bien/frases-faciles-ingles-aprenderse-antes-viajar-otro-pais-PP3313375A). Si est√° interesado en aprender ingl√©s, estas funciones son gratuitas y valiosas que pueden ayudarlo a alcanzar sus objetivos. Todas est√°n disponibles para su uso en Iphone y Android, por medio √∫nicamente de la ‚Äòapp‚Äô de Google Chrome. ¬øC√≥mo aprender ingl√©s con Google? - ‚ÄòSpeaking Practice‚Äô Cuenta con funciones para interactuar en tiempo real, participando en sesiones de pr√°ctica y obteniendo correcciones de la pronunciaci√≥n de los usuarios. Tiene una interfaz muy similar a la de la famosa ‚Äòapp‚Äô Duolingo, con un apartado para observar el n√∫mero de palabras practicadas y un conteo de los d√≠as que las personas usan la herramienta. Adem√°s, hace preguntas que el usuario debe responder de forma oral para conocer practicar el speaking. Para utilizarla, se debe iniciar sesi√≥n en la cuenta de Google y buscar una traducci√≥n en la barra de b√∫squeda. ‚ÄòSpeak‚Äô utiliza inteligencia artificial para proporcionar comentarios personalizados y retroalimentaci√≥n en tiempo real. Esto ayuda a los usuarios a aprender y mejorar sus habilidades de ingl√©s de una manera eficaz y divertida. (Lea tambi√©n: [Si est√° estrenando celular, tenga en cuenta estos consejos para cuidar su seguridad](https://www.pulzo.com/tecnologia/como-cuidar-seguridad-celular-nuevo-pasos-tener-cuenta-PP3360822A)) - ‚ÄòWord Coach‚Äô Esta es otra herramienta interesante y entretenida. La idea es que el usuario aprenda vocabulario a trav√©s de un juego de palabras con niveles distintos. Cuenta con una gran variedad de t√©rminos preseleccionados para estudiar y conocer su significado, ya sean verbos, objetos, colores, lugares, entre otros. Es perfecto para practicar el vocabulario com√∫n que se usa en la vida cotidiana. Ofrece una experiencia c√≥moda y visual al presentar opciones no s√≥lo escritas sino con im√°genes para aprender a asociar los diferentes conceptos. - ‚ÄòGoogle Warmup‚Äô Esta herramienta se enfoca en ayudar a los usuarios a prepararse para una entrevista de trabajo en ingl√©s. Ofrece una variedad de recursos para ayudar a los usuarios a practicar sus habilidades y a sentirse m√°s c√≥modos con este proceso. Cuenta con una base de datos de preguntas de entrevista comunes, organizadas por industria y nivel de experiencia. (Vea tambi√©n: [¬øSe deber√≠a borrar el historial de Google por seguridad? Esto es lo que tiene que saber](https://www.pulzo.com/tecnologia/por-que-es-importante-borrar-historial-google-PP3356031A)) Adem√°s, hace simulaciones de entrevistas que permiten a los usuarios practicar sus habilidades de este √°mbito en un entorno seguro, generando consejos personalizados al usuario para que mejore sus respuestas y se sienta mejor preparado para asumir el reto en el momento que tenga que ponerlo en pr√°ctica. *Este art√≠culo fue escrito y curado por periodistas del equipo de [Robby Tecnolog√≠a](https://www.pulzo.com/noticias/robby-tecnologia), con apoyo de una inteligencia artificial que utiliza machine learning para producir texto. LO √öLTIMO [Tecnolog√≠a] Hace 2 horas [Nuevo tipo de fraude tiene en alerta a las autoridades de Colombia; advierten a ciudadanos](/tecnologia/que-es-smishing-como-evitar-ser-victima-fraude-colombia-PP3392099A) [Tecnolog√≠a] Hace 3 horas [Moda estilo ‚Äòcoquette‚Äô lleg√≥ a WhatsApp: c√≥mo activar el √≠cono de forma f√°cil](/tecnologia/como-poner-whatsapp-modo-coquette-trucos-para-tenerlo-forma-facil-PP3393984) [Tecnolog√≠a]

author: @englishjagrannews
title: Pakistan Army Occupies Sharda Temple In PoK; Committee Seeks India's Intervention For Restoration
text: - By [Vivek Raj](https://english.jagran.com/authors/vivek-raj) - Published: Fri, 29 Dec 2023 03:18 PM (IST) - Source:PTI The Save Sharda Committee (SSC) on Friday sought the help of the Indian government to remove the "encroachment by the Pakistan Army" on the Sharda temple premises in Pakistan-Occupied Kashmir (POK), in order to pave way for its restoration. Addressing a press conference at Press Club of Bangalore, SSC founder Ravinder Pandita alleged that the Pakistan army had encroached upon the dilapidated old Sharda temple premises and opened a coffee home there despite a court order in the committee's favour. ‚ÄúSave Sharda Committee requests the Government of India and Prime Minister Narendra Modi to raise the issue of encroachments and removal of a coffee home recently erected on Sharda Peeth premises by the Pakistan army. This is despite the Supreme Court of Pakistan Occupied Kashmir's landmark judgment on January 3, 2023 pronounced in favour of Save Sharda Committee based on its representation seeking to stop encroachments,‚Äù he said. [Also ReadAAP's Request Seeking Raghav Chadha's Appointment As Rajya Sabha Leader Rejected By Chairman](https://english.jagran.com/india/arvind-kejriwals-request-seeking-raghav-chadhas-appointment-as-rajya-sabha-party-leader-rejected-by-chairman-10123639) ALSO READ: [ ‚ÄòPhir Aayega Modi‚Äô; BJP Launches Campaign Video For 2024 Lok Sabha Elections](https://english.jagran.com/india/phir-aayega-modi-bjp-launches-campaign-video-for-2024-lok-sabha-elections-indi-congress-rahul-pm-modi-phir-aayega-modi-video-10123627) He added that civil society in PoK has also raised their voice in tandem with SSC on this issue as well as about the damages to the boundary wall. Pandita demanded that Sharda Peeth be reopened for devotees to go on pilgrimage. "We will give a call for a march to the LoC and cross it if the coffee home is not removed by Pakistan authorities and its army. All Sharda supporters should be ready for this march in the near future," he said. [Also ReadSunehri Masjid Demolition: NDMC Proposes To Bulldoze 150-Year-Old Mosque, Seeks Public Opinion; Owaisi Slams Decision](https://english.jagran.com/india/sunehri-masjid-demolition-ndmc-proposes-to-bulldoze-150yearold-mosque-seeks-public-opinion-owaisi-slams-decision-10123644) He also called for Sharda Peeth to be declared a UNESCO heritage site. The SSC founder told reporters that a website has been launched with the aim of providing complete information and a travel guide for pilgrims and tourists on the newly reconstructed Sharda temple at Teetwal and a Sikh gurudwara that stood at the same place before 1947 but was burnt down in tribal raids. The construction of the new Sharda Yatra Temple at Teetwal in Kashmir, which was virtually inaugurated on March 22 by Union Home Minister Amit Shah, was supported by the Dakshinamnaya Sringeri Mutt in Karnataka. Teetwal, where the temple has been built now, was the historic base camp for devotees who would go to Goddess Sharda's shrine before partition, according to reports. ALSO READ: [Nitish Kumar Elected JDU President After Lalan Singh's Resignation From Top Post; Official Announcement Soon](https://english.jagran.com/india/lalan-singh-resigns-as-jdu-national-president-national-executive-meeting-nitish-kumar-10123598) Nearly 10,000 pilgrims have visited the new Sharda Yatra temple and Gurudwara since its inauguration in March this year. (Except for the headline, the story is not edited by Jagran English Staff) [English Jagran.com](https://english.jagran.com/)Jagran English is available on WhatsApp. Join now for latest news from India and around the world.
